conclusion: Analyze the flow of liquid through the depicted baffle system to predict which container (D or E) the liquid will flow into.
The baffles are the rectangular sections marked with arrows (A, B, C) on the surface.
The arrows labeled A, B, and C indicate the direction of flow towards the right.
Since the arrows point to the right, the liquid will flow from the left side of the baffle to the right side.
The liquid will flow from the container labeled A, through the baffle, and into the container labeled B.
The liquid will flow into container D.
